properties.name: Temp_Domain_Table
properties.description: Temp domain table to store unique domain values

properties.name: Delay
properties.description: Number of minutes for the last security activity (use to calculate timestamp from past date)

Enable near real time notification for Umbrella Security events
- Notify in Cisco Webex
- Enrichment CTR + Investigate
- Create Casebook and Incident in CTR
- Create Case in The Hive
- Create Case in ServiceNow
- Notification update in Cisco Teams

Set Global Variable Umbrella_loop_counter to 500 before to run
Enable Triggers 5mn for permanent execution
Check the loop counter (global variable). If not 500 it means a workflow is still running so do nothing)
Limit to 500 iteration set by SXAO global env variable
Now - Delay in minutes (local variable)

properties.script:
import json, sys
list1  = json.loads(sys.argv[1])
list_set = set(list1)
unique = []
unique_list = (list(list_set))
for x in unique_list:
    unique.append(x)

result = sanitized_Analyzers.replace("'","")
